name: arch2-discord-bot
description: Discord bot for Arch 2 Addicts community with XYIAN guild integration

scripts.build: echo 'JavaScript deployment - no build step required' && exit 0
scripts.deploy: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run changelog:update
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run changelog:update
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run changelog:update
scripts.changelog:update: echo '## [$(npm pkg get version | tr -d ",")] - $(date +%Y-%m-%d)' >> CHANGELOG.md && echo '### Added' >> CHANGELOG.md && echo '- Feature updates' >> CHANGELOG.md && echo '' >> CHANGELOG.md

author: Kyle
